/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .video-embed-field-launch-modal img { width: 100%; height: auto; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget { position: relative; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget img { background-color: #0071BC; display: block; height: auto; margin: auto; width: 100%; opacity: 1; transition: opacity 150ms ease-in-out; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-embed-field-launch-modal { transition: background-color 150ms ease-in-out; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-embed-field-launch-modal:hover, .media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-embed-field-launch-modal:focus { background-color: #0071BC; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-embed-field-launch-modal:hover img, .media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-embed-field-launch-modal:focus img { opacity: 0.2; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-image a { display: inline; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content { border: 1px solid #D6D7D9; border-radius: 0 0 0.2rem 0.2rem; border-top: 0; padding: 1rem 1rem 0.5rem; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content .label.media-type:before { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free'; font-weight: 900; content: '\f144'; font-size: 0.75rem; margin-right: 0.5rem; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content h3 { margin: 0 0 1rem; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content h3 a { font-family: 'Merriweather Bold'; font-weight: 700; color: #212121; font-size: 1.0625rem; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-teaser-content .field--name-field-video-date { font-family: 'Lato Bold'; font-weight: 700; color: #767676; font-size: 0.625rem; letter-spacing: 0.1em; text-transform: uppercase; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-embed-field-launch-modal { display: block; position: relative; cursor: pointer; }

.media--type-remote-video.media--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-remote-video-widget .video-embed-field-launch-modal:after { content: ''; position: absolute; display: block; background: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/playbutton.png"); top: 50%; margin-top: -38px; left: 50%; margin-left: -38px; height: 77px; width: 77px; }
